#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#include<set>
#include<vector>
int main(void) {
    int n,nn,i,a,t;
    vector <int> v;
    multiset < int > s;
    multiset <int > :: iterator it;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>n;
        nn=n;
        while(n--) {
            cin>>a;
            v.push_back(a);
        }
        for(i=0;i<nn;i++){
            s.insert(v.at(i));
            it=s.find(v.at(i));
            it++;
            if(it!=s.end())
                s.erase(it);
        }
        cout<<s.size()<<"\n";
        s.clear();
        v.clear();
    }
    return 0;
}
